title: Is Master Yi in a bad spot balance wise?
body: He is on a league of his own. A god at shredding people down, taking towers/objectives, etc. He went from being a late game champ to devouring people through the entirety of the game. He is literally a one man army. He can be CC'd but in solo Q people tend to play squishy and I have little control over what they choose to play, so he melts them, and also has alpha strike always up to avoid damage/cc. He isn't broken, just seems particularly scary to go against.

replies.body: Yi is always in a bad spot balance wise. He's either left severely unpowered, or he gets that one buff and he's suddenly Michael Meyers stabbing everyone from out of the blue. He NEEDS a new kit. There is no other way around it. When someone's nickname is "Baby's First Pentakill" or "Press Q to Penta," he's a massive issue.
It is because of his Q and True damage. If they reworked those abilities he could be in a better place.
Yi can die to broken point-click burst.  Yes.
I got destroyed by nocturne as Yi.
